React Data Aggregator

API calls for all the things! This is a combo React app + separate Rails API app. It's loaded with location-specific feeds, which are the product of 6 different APIs repackaged as one inside the Rails API. All of that makes the Rails API a pretty tidy package to serve to the React app.

Check out the repo README for a tour of the app
complete with code snippet explanations and screenshots.

My Role: solo project, full stack
